sentences.en: Three-fourths of the apartments in the ghetto had no heat.
sentences.cn: 贫民区有四分之三的公寓没有暖气。

sentences.en: Three-fourths said they worried about the possibility of another attack.
sentences.cn: 四分之三的人说他们担心可能再次发生袭击。

sentences.en: More than three-fourths of government expenses are used for this purpose.
sentences.cn: 四分之三以上的政府开支用于完成这个目标。
